maven-protobuf-plugin Maven Mojo
Last Published: 2014-06-02  | Version: 0.3.2
maven-protobuf-plugin Maven Mojo
Project Documentation
  • Project Information
  • Project Reports

protobuf:test-compile

Full name:

net.chwthewke.maven.protobuf:protobuf-maven-plugin:0.3.2:test-compile

Description:

Goal which executes the protoc compiler.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: generate-test-sources.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
includeArchives Dependency[] - The content of these dependencies' archives are added to the sources to be included by protoc.
includeDirectories String[] - Additional directories of protocol sources to include
packagedIncludeDependencies Dependency[] - Protocol whose sources are dependencies. The dependency must be a project built with this plugin. Use the proto or test-proto classifier for the dependency (see the packagedSourceDependencies parameter).
packagedSourceDependencies Dependency[] - This is a shortcut to depend on a protocol built with this plugin (presumably when you want to compile the same .proto with a different plugin) Specify a classifier of proto for the dependency, its -proto-sources.jar will be added to sources, and its -proto-deps.jar to includes. Likewise if the protocol was build as test sources, use test-proto as a classifier.
protocExecutable Dependency - The protocol executable dependency. To use this goal you must either supply protoc on the PATH (and eschew this parameter) or make the dependency in parameter resolvable to an archive containing the protoc executable, which must have type tar.gz and classifier according to the required os ("windows", "linux_x86", or "linux_amd64" are supported)
protocPlugins ProtocPluginDefinition[] - The plugins to execute with their respective output directories. See the javadoc for the parameters of ProtocPluginDefinition.
sourceArchives Dependency[] - The content of these dependencies' archives are added to the sources to be compiled by protoc.
sourceDirectories String[] - The source directories of the protocol. Default: ${basedir}/src/main/proto

Parameter Details

includeArchives:

The content of these dependencies' archives are added to the sources to be included by protoc.
  • Type: org.apache.maven.model.Dependency[]
  • Required: No

includeDirectories:

Additional directories of protocol sources to include
  • Type: java.lang.String[]
  • Required: No

packagedIncludeDependencies:

Protocol whose sources are dependencies. The dependency must be a project built with this plugin. Use the proto or test-proto classifier for the dependency (see the packagedSourceDependencies parameter).
  • Type: org.apache.maven.model.Dependency[]
  • Required: No

packagedSourceDependencies:

This is a shortcut to depend on a protocol built with this plugin (presumably when you want to compile the same .proto with a different plugin) Specify a classifier of proto for the dependency, its -proto-sources.jar will be added to sources, and its -proto-deps.jar to includes. Likewise if the protocol was build as test sources, use test-proto as a classifier.
  • Type: org.apache.maven.model.Dependency[]
  • Required: No

protocExecutable:

The protocol executable dependency. To use this goal you must either supply protoc on the PATH (and eschew this parameter) or make the dependency in parameter resolvable to an archive containing the protoc executable, which must have type tar.gz and classifier according to the required os ("windows", "linux_x86", or "linux_amd64" are supported)
  • Type: org.apache.maven.model.Dependency
  • Required: No

protocPlugins:

The plugins to execute with their respective output directories. See the javadoc for the parameters of ProtocPluginDefinition.
  • Type: net.chwthewke.maven.protobuf.plugins.ProtocPluginDefinition[]
  • Required: No

sourceArchives:

The content of these dependencies' archives are added to the sources to be compiled by protoc.
  • Type: org.apache.maven.model.Dependency[]
  • Required: No

sourceDirectories:

The source directories of the protocol. Default: ${basedir}/src/main/proto
  • Type: java.lang.String[]
  • Required: No
